description: This file contains shell script functions related to state red recovery operations for a device, including support checks, status queries, logging, URL retrieval, and credential management.

methods.name: stateRedlog
methods.description: Logs messages to the recovery log file.

methods.name: isStateRedSupported
methods.description: Checks if the state red support script exists.

methods.name: isInStateRed
methods.description: Determines if the device is currently in state red.

methods.name: unsetStateRed
methods.description: Removes state red flag files and resets state red variables.

methods.name: checkAndEnterStateRed
methods.description: Sets the device into state red upon specific curl error codes.

methods.name: getStateRedXconfUrl
methods.description: Retrieves the recovery URL from device configuration.

methods.name: getStateRedCreds
methods.description: Obtains credentials for state red operations.
